DOC.brief_summary: The study determine amodiaquine tablet ( Pfizer ) , antimalaria agent , pharmaceutically equivalent comparator product ( Arsuamoon-Guilin China ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Amodiaquine Tablet ( Pfizer ) To Amodiaquine Tablets ( Arsuamoon-Guilin China ) In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . BMI 18 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Evidence history clinically significant abnormality . A positive urine drug screen , history regular alcohol consumption .
